name: Discover Dungeons
description:
The Darkness calls you, Are you brave enough to answer?

Discover Dungeons is a game that came to exist during the Godot Wild Jam #19

In Discover Dungeons you start out as an humble villager seeking loot and adventure.

as u discover more Dungeons, Secrets and Relics from the past the darkness starts to consume u..

can u keep your mind straight?

Controls:

w,a,s,d or arrow keys to move

mouse and right click to aim and shoot.

tutorial will be added soon.

This Game is in a very early development state.

frequent updates will be added.

i'd love to be in close contact with people playing my game, as i'm making a game for us all to enjoy!

Discord: SavageGreen#5704

Special Thanks to SuperDark.

For the characters.

All other artwork is made by myself.

in order to run the game you need to download both files and run the .exe in the same folder as the .pck file.
